results.title: Conflict of interest (D)
results.creator_credit: Tony Wellington, Ian MacArthur and Film Australia
results.brief_description: The basis of this film is the National Park and Wildlife Services kangaroo control and management program. The kangaroo is shown, historically, as a source of food for the Aborigines, as game and a source of income for the first Europeans and today as a symbol of Australia. The Kangaroo Management Program is discussed at length. It aims to ensure the conservation of all species of macropods, the investigation of agricultural damage and the best use of product derived from culling kangaroos. Statistical information on kangaroo culling is presented diagramatically.

results.title: Confidential Report = Mr Arkadin
results.creator_credit: Orson Welles, Louis Dolivet and Sevilla Studios
results.brief_description: Two corpses on the Naples quayside lead Guy Van Stratten into the bizarre world of Mr Arkadin, a fabulously rich tycoon with a beautiful daughter and a shady past, which he claims to have forgotten. Van Stratten is hired to investigate - with murderous results. Welles’ second European film returned to the fascination with total power which had made “Citizen Kane” his youthful masterpiece. Arkadin is closer to Harry Lime than to Kane, because he is a profiteer … who nourishes himself on the corruption of the universe. Stars Michael Redgrave, Katina Paxinou and Akim Tamiroff.

results.title: Confessions of a Train Spotter
results.brief_description: Michael Palin fulfils his dream as a childhood train spotter and travels the length of Britain by train - from Euston to the Kyle of Lochalsh - on a fascinating journey of history and rediscovery. Rated: G

results.title: Confessions of a Simple Surgeon
results.creator_credit: Paul Harmon and Educational Division of N S W Dept of TAFE
results.brief_description: This humorous presents the associated health risks of smoking and passive smoking in an often graphic but factual manner. “Confessions” calls for a total ban on tobacco promotion and its message to viewers is clear. If you smoke, quit. If you don’t , don’t be conned into smoking and avoid being a victim of passive smoking. It is presented by Dr Arthur Chesterfield-Evans, whose experience in surgery on cancer victims led him to become an activist in BUGAUP (Billboard Utilising Graffitists Against Unhealthy Promotions) and in the legal activities of the Non-Smokers Movement of Australia.

results.title: Conduction in P and N crystals
results.brief_description: Part two of the Semiconductor Physics series demonstrates how an extra free electron is introduced into a germanium crystal. One of the atoms having four valency electrons is replaced by a foreign atom having five valency electrons, such as an atom of antimony.
results.description: Part two of the Semiconductor Physics series demonstrates how an extra free electron is introduced into a germanium crystal. One of the atoms having four valency electrons is replaced by a foreign atom having five valency electrons, such as an atom of antimony.

results.title: Conducting good music
results.creator_credit: Milan Herzog, David W. Ridgway and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: A brief outline of the history of conducting leads to a discussion of conducting as a sign language, which translates the composer’s signs and instructions on the score into signals which the orchestra can follow. How each conductor gives their own interpretation to a work is shown by contrasting performances of the same passage conducted by different artists. Features the Vienna Symphony Orchestra.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Milan Herzog, David W. Ridgway and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films

results.title: Condom sense
results.creator_credit: Steve Faigenbaum, Jim Locker and Cerberus Productions
results.brief_description: A very original, informative film aimed at encouraging men to take a more active role in contraception. Using comedy to dispel the myths and complaints associated with condom use, the film presents accurate information about birth control and opens up the issues of communication and responsibility in relationships.

results.title: Conditioning the young athlete (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Introduces the coach to the basic principles involved in training young athletes for competition. A training program should put together the appropriate combination of energy and muscle fitness according to the requirements of the sport.
